name: Seahorse Shooter: Kevin's Revenge
description:
Kevin The Seahorse used to live a humble life with his wife, Wifey De La Wifehorse, until one day, she confronts him and says that she's leaving him for a much more attractive seahorse.

This leads Kevin into a fiery rage, taking his pistol to the Deepwaters and unleashing hell onto innocent seahorses.

Kevin is met with resistance from the local police, but will Kevin be able to use additional weapons and upgrades found within floating bubbles in order to prevail over these foes? 

As the battle ensues, the police become more prevalent, adapting weapons and tactics in a desperate attempt to stop the psychopathic sadistic seahorse.
